answers.answer: To have gestational diabetes it has to be at least 130 or 140

I have gestational diabetes. Normal ranges in the morning/before a meal is under 90. 2 hours after a meal it should be under 140. That's of course if you actually eat the correct serving size of carbs and sugars vs protein

If it below 120 is good. Just remember to eat healthy and watch your carb intake. Eat more protein with your meals and exercise daily. I have gestational diabetes and must take insulin for the rest of my pregnancy. I say as long as you eat healthy and exercise you should be fine.

question: My blood sugar today was 111 earlier then i just checked it right now and its 112 . Im scared to get diabetes. What is the highest it can be?
title: diabetes
